e: ￹`Ma~`tiri'~ `ko~ `'okak~ `ako~.￺My bones show.￻我的骨頭顯現出來
￹`Pa~`tiri'~`en~ `kami~ `to~ `fa~^`lohay~ `a~ `paliding~ `iso~.￺Show us your new vehicle.￻把你的新車顯示給我們看
d.f: ￹￺to show * to cause to be seen￻看，顯示，看見的原因

e: ￹`Ma~`tatiri'~ `konini~ `a~ `codad~.￺These two books are laid side by side (for reference).￻這兩本書可相互對照
￹`Pasa~`sotiri'en~ `konini~ `a~ `tosa~￺Compare these two.￻將兩者對照一下，把這兩者比較一下
